text: ANNUAL TARGET SETTING (ATS) FORMANNUAL TARGET SETTING (ATS) FORM FOR SCHOOL OF LANGUAGES INSTRUCTORSFOR SCHOOL OF LANGUAGES INSTRUCTORS INSTRUCTOR INFORMATIONINSTRUCTOR INFORMATION Name of InstructorName of Instructor Date of EmploymentDate of Employment Academic YearAcademic Year Date of ATS meetingDate of ATS meeting 1.
